overview.en: Origo.Network is the scalable privacy preserving platform for decentralized applications that uses zero-knowledge proof to implement the privacy protection of data in smart contract. It uses off-chain computation, on-chain verification and sharding technology to increase transaction speed while ensure the correctness which greatly promote the use of blockchain application.
overview.zh: Origo Network是去中心化应用的可扩展隐私保护平台，利用零知识证明实现了智能合约中数据的隐私保护，使用链下计算、链上验证和分片技术等，保证计算正确性的同时提高交易速度，大大推动了区块链应用的落地。
